room_title: Escape room "Science Lab Spy" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: Super fun and challenging. Went through both the Titanic Room and the Science Room. Both were totally unique and challenging. Had a great time with the family and will be back soon.

room_title: Escape room "Science Lab Spy" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: Our group of 8 had never done an escape room and the Science Room was a GREAT way to start! The staff are encouraging, friendly, and professional. The clues were very well organized and the information engaging. We will definitely be back to try our hand at another room. Great family fun!

room_title: Escape room "Science Lab Spy" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: We tried the lab room and it was awesome! So many clues and the whole room was used. Looking forward to do the pirate room next. We loved getting to have our own group in the room so that we were able to work together and talk freely.

room_title: Escape room "Science Lab Spy" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: What a great time with my good friends and my love! We will definitely be back to make some more great memories. The science lab rocks and the owner was awesome too.

room_title: Escape room "Science Lab Spy" by Countdown Escape Room in Virginia Beach
review: We did the science lab lockdown. This was so much fun! Five great minds plus one slacker (me) solved the puzzle but we could feel the clock ticking.
